metadata.synopsis: Raj and Simran meet on a trip to Europe. After some initial misadventures, they fall in love. The battle begins to win over two traditional families.
metadata.genre: Art House & International/Comedy/Kids & Family/Musical & Performing Arts/Romance

reviews: Today, DDLJ is at once both intimately familiar and unmistakably of its era, a response to the influx of western culture into India in the 1990s and an attempt to center both progress and tradition in the very same breath.
